# Code of Conduct

ADB Device Manager 2 is a closed-source software project that provides binaries (.exe and .apk) for end users.

We do not accept code contributions or pull requests.  
This document simply outlines how users should communicate respectfully when requesting support or reporting issues.

## Respectful Communication
When contacting support or opening an issue:
- Be clear and polite  
- Avoid abusive or hostile language  
- Provide helpful information so we can solve your problem faster  

## Support Contact
If you need help, please use:
üìß Email: adbdevicemanager2@gmail.com  
üêû Issues: https://github.com/Shrey113/Adb-Device-Manager-2/issues

## Purpose
This is not a community-driven open-source project.  
The Code of Conduct exists only to ensure respectful communication during support interactions.
